info.title: Private Ephemeral SPL Token API
info.description: Build transactions for the MagicBlock Private token program (https://docs.magicblock.gg/pages/private-ephemeral-rollups-pers)

post.summary: Checked Transfer for SPL and Ephemeral ATA

CreateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.title: CreateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest
CreateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.description: Create a permission account for an ephemeral ATA.

DelegateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.title: DelegateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest
DelegateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.description: Delegate an ephemeral ATA's permission to a Delegation Program.

owner_program.title: Owner Program
owner_program.description: Program that will own the delegated account

DelegateEphemeralAtaRequest.title: DelegateEphemeralAtaRequest
DelegateEphemeralAtaRequest.description: Delegate an ephemeral ATA to a Delegation Program.

DepositSplTokensRequest.title: DepositSplTokensRequest
DepositSplTokensRequest.description: Deposit SPL tokens into an ephemeral ATA.

InitializeEphemeralAtaRequest.title: InitializeEphemeralAtaRequest
InitializeEphemeralAtaRequest.description: Initialize an Ephemeral ATA for a user-mint pair.

InitializeGlobalVaultRequest.title: InitializeGlobalVaultRequest
InitializeGlobalVaultRequest.description: Initialize a Global Vault for a specific mint.

ResetEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.title: ResetEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest
ResetEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.description: Reset permission flags on an ephemeral ATA's permission.

UndelegateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.title: UndelegateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest
UndelegateEphemeralAtaPermissionRequest.description: Undelegate an ephemeral ATA's permission from a Delegation Program.

UndelegateEphemeralAtaRequest.title: UndelegateEphemeralAtaRequest
UndelegateEphemeralAtaRequest.description: Undelegate an ephemeral ATA from a Delegation Program.

decimals.title: Decimals
decimals.description: Number of decimals for the mint

TransferEphemeralAtaRequest.title: TransferEphemeralAtaRequest
TransferEphemeralAtaRequest.description: Transfer SPL tokens from one account to another using checked transfer.

WithdrawSplTokensRequest.title: WithdrawSplTokensRequest
WithdrawSplTokensRequest.description: Withdraw SPL tokens from an ephemeral ATA.
